meanings.definition: Geometrids: a family of moths known for their distinctive looping flight pattern.
meanings.sent1: The geometrids fluttered gracefully through the night sky.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a few geometrids flying around the porch light.
meanings.sent3: The geometrids decided to have a race to see who could loop the most!
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves resembled the elegant flight of geometrids.
meanings.sent5: The geometrids painted a mesmerizing pattern in the air with their flight.

meanings.definition: Geometrids: caterpillars that are part of the Geometridae family of moths.
meanings.sent1: The geometrids crawled slowly along the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The garden was full of geometrids munching on leaves.
meanings.sent3: The geometrids had a picnic on the leaf, enjoying a caterpillar feast!
meanings.sent4: The geometrids inched along like tiny green measuring tapes.
meanings.sent5: The geometrids transformed into beautiful moths, leaving their caterpillar days behind.
